name: Airscale
purpose: Find companies by location, size, keywords and extract domains
description: Company database and domain lookup tool for B2B lead generation. Allows searching for target companies by criteria (location, company size, keywords, industry) and exports company domains for further enrichment. Features enterprise arbitrage capability where searching for 1 company can return up to 40 email addresses.
cost_structure: Credit-based, enterprise arbitrage: 1:40 ratio (1 credit = up to 40 emails)

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Target Company Discovery and Domain Extraction
use_cases: filter companies by size and industry
workflows: Multi-Source Lead Enrichment Pipeline (Airscale → Anymailfinder → 50-80% enrichment)

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Company Domain Lookup for Lead Enrichment
steps: Define search criteria (location, size, keywords, industry)
Export company list with domains to CSV
Enrich with decision-maker emails (50-80% success rate)
typical_workflow_pattern.time_estimate: 5-10 minutes for initial search, 10-15 min for enrichment

limitations: Requires clear ICP definition for best results
Credit system may be expensive for small companies
Limited to company-level data (needs Anymailfinder for contacts)
